Desc.eng: Looking for the hidden treasure. The map says that it’s here.
All I can see is a boring old chest.
Because this is a traditional chest, hiding in plain sight. Not a modern one with all those high security standards. You know, reinforced lids, poisoned darts and the like.
Then what are you waiting for? …What have we here?
Let me see. A rare artifact… something that looks like one of those gems from Borislav’s statue… and a dragon tooth! A real one. And gold, of course. Plenty of that.
